author: djrtwo
content:
Dropping a note on weak subjectivity and how we might approach it in practice to ensure it's not just "trust infura"

https://notes.ethereum.org/@djrtwo/ws-sync-in-practice

The primary actionable item from this doc is to create a standard URI scheme for standardizing
1. which states/roots are served (e.g. `epoch % 256` is a reasonable value)
2. actually making the queries for `checkpoint_state(epoch)`, `checkpoint_root(epoch)`

beyond that, I just wanted to dump these ideas for a more active discussion
